channel.title: World
channel.description: The Washington Post World section provides information and analysis of breaking world news stories. In addition to our world news and video, Post World News offers discussions and blogs on major international news and economic issues.

item.title: Years after his capture in Mariupol, his family received only his broken body
item.dc:creator: Siobhán O'Grady, Serhii Korolchuk
item.description: The case highlights Ukrainians’ desperation to get news about their loved ones missing in the war and fears over their fates in Russia.
